summary.text: Creative and performance-driven Full‑Stack Engineer with a frontend flair, bringing 2 years of internship experience building modern, interactive, and scalable UIs using React, Next.js, Redux Toolkit, and SvelteKit. Known for migrating large codebases to TypeScript, reducing client-side bottlenecks, and crafting real-time interfaces. Passionate about frontend architecture, UI/UX polish, and developer tooling, while maintaining strong backend and DevOps foundations.

categories.items: TypeScript, JavaScript, Go, Java, Python, SQL, Bash

experience.title: Software Development Engineer Intern
achievements: Migrated 200+ legacy JS components to TypeScript + Redux in Next.js; decreased build‑time errors 40% and boosted feature velocity 30%.
Improved UI consistency and accessibility by refactoring shared components using best practices in design systems.
Built interactive WebSocket-powered dashboards for real-time GPS tracking and delivery analytics.
Collaborated with design team to improve UI responsiveness across devices and browsers.

experience.title: Frontend-leaning Full Stack Developer Intern
achievements: Restructured React component hierarchy; reduced client re-renders 40%, keeping First‑Input Delay < 50 ms.
Built and styled reusable frontend components with Tailwind CSS and integrated CMS-powered data with Sanity.
Designed and implemented responsive layouts ensuring pixel-perfect rendering across devices.

experience.title: Full‑Stack Web Developer Intern
achievements: Developed responsive and accessible UIs in Next.js for government tax interfaces handling 75k req/min.
Created custom frontend workflows using dynamic forms and PDF generation tools (PDFMake & Mammoth).
Integrated secure session handling via HTTPOnly cookies, JWT tokens, and WAF policies.

projects.name: codeCollab
projects.description: Real‑time code‑sharing IDE with collaborative editing (Next.js, WebSockets, CodeMirror); designed intuitive editor interface and synced 20+ users using operational-transform logic.

projects.name: get‑proctored.ai
projects.description: AI‑powered proctoring frontend using TensorFlow.js, MediaPipe, and WebRTC; built responsive interfaces and live video preview layers.

projects.name: TS‑ML Algorithms
projects.description: Interactive frontend TS library visualizing classic ML & search algorithms (K‑Means, GA, A*, A*).

projects.name: Pixel Drawing Simulator
projects.description: Canvas-based pixel drawing and animation tool showcasing graphics algorithms with an intuitive UI; includes export, zoom, and history tools.
